Package hep.graphics.heprep.util

Utilities for math, colors, fonts and i/o for HepRep.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ListSet  
MapList A Map where its values can be retrieved as a List
 

Class Summary
ArrayListSet  
HashMapList Extends a Map and keeps a List to be able to return the list of Values.
HepRepColor Static class to allow for color manipulation
HepRepConvert  
HepRepFont Static class to allow for font manipulation
HepRepIO  
HepRepMath  
HepRepUtil  
ValueSet This Set is created from a Map and will allow iteration over its values as a Set.
